Hotel.name: Palazzo Naiadi, The Dedica Anthology (Formerly Boscolo Exedra)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Boscolo Exedra Roma, Autograph Collection, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Piazza della Repubblica and Santa Maria degli Angeli. This 5-star hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 236 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

With a stay at Boscolo Exedra Roma, Autograph Collection, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Piazza della Repubblica and Santa Maria degli Angeli. This 5-star hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza della Repubblica - 0 km / 0 mi
Santa Maria degli Angeli - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Gallery of Ancient Art - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Palace of Expositions - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Barberini - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Barberini - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Prassede - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Sistina Theater - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 23.5 km / 14.6 mi

The preferred airport for Boscolo Exedra Roma, Autograph Collection is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please be advised that the pricing of rooms is for maximum 2 adults only. For any additional guests, a fee of 91 - 111 EUR per person is to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival.City tax payable directly at the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. rates are based on existing bedding only. City tax 7 euro per person per day not included in the rates and is directly payable by the guest at the hotel in the time of check out. Valid for individual reservation for an overall maximum of 9 rooms. Rates shall not apply to meetings, incentives, congresses and events or groups. NO PROMOTIONS APPLICABLE ON THIRD BED.
